loginPage.title: RE A GO AMOGELA GAPE!
loginPage.subtitle: Ka kopo tsenya dintlha tša gago go tsena.
loginPage.emailPlaceholder: Tsenya aterese ya gago ya imeili
loginPage.welcomeImageAlt: Kamogelo ya go Tsena go Mavito
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: O tsene ka katlego, fela ga go na tokene yeo e amogetšwego. Ka kopo ikopanye le thekgo.
loginPage.errorDefault: Go tsena go paletšwe. Ka kopo lekola dintlha tša gago.
loginPage.errorUnexpectedFormat: Phošo ya go tsena (maemo {{status}}). Sebopego sa phošo seo se sa lebelelwago.
loginPage.errorWithStatus: Go tsena go paletšwe (maemo {{status}}). Ka kopo leka gape.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Go bile le phošo ya neteweke yeo e sa tsebjego. Ka kopo leka gape.

registrationPage.title: THOMA BJALE
registrationPage.subtitle: Hlola akhaonte ya gago ya Mavito.
registrationPage.firstNamePlaceholder: Tsenya leina la gago la mathomo
registrationPage.emailPlaceholder: Tsenya aterese ya gago ya imeili
registrationPage.haveAccount: O šetše o na le akhaonte?
registrationPage.errorAgreeToTerms: O swanetše go dumela melao le dipeelano.
registrationPage.alertSuccess: O ngwadišitše ka katlego! Ka kopo tšwela pele go tsena.
registrationPage.errorDefault: Go ngwadiša go paletšwe. Ka kopo leka gape.
registrationPage.errorWithStatus: Go ngwadiša go paletšwe (maemo {{status}}). Ka kopo leka gape.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Go bile le phošo ya neteweke yeo e sa tsebjego. Ka kopo leka gape.

dashboard.searchDescription: Nyaka mareo ka dipolelo tse mmalwa
dashboard.downloadDescription: Hwetša le go laolla didirišwa tša mareo
